Class Craps

  • java.lang.Object
    • Craps

  • public class Craps
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the variables and actions that are done during a game of Craps.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    James Crocker s4914680

    • Constructor Detail

      • Craps

        public Craps()

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        This method performs the action when a person plays the game. It creates two Dice objects, rolls them, and then adds the two rolls together. It does not take any inputs nor does it return anything.

      • gameResult

        public java.lang.String gameResult()
        This method is used to calculate whether or not the player has won, lost, or drawn based on the sum of their two rolls.
        Returns:
        "Win" is returned when the sum of the rolls is equal to either 7 or 11. "Lose" is returned when the sum of the rolls is equal to either 2, 3, or 11. "Draw" is returned when the sum of the rolls is equal to anything else

      • setBet

        public void setBet(int num)
        This is used to set the players bet to the inputted integer.
        Parameters:
        num - The value that the variable "bet" will be set to.

      • getBet

        public int getBet()
        This is used to retrieve what the players bet is currently set at.
        Returns:
        The variable bet.

      • setMoney

        public void setMoney(int num)
        This is used to set the players money to the inputted integer.
        Parameters:
        num - The value that money will be set to.

      • getMoney

        public int getMoney()
        This is used to retrieve what the players money is currently set at.
        Returns:
        the variable money.

      • getDice1

        public Dice getDice1()
        This is used to get the Dice object dice1 from Craps. This is so that other classes can access the information stored in the Dice.
        Returns:
        the Dice object dice1

      • getDice2

        public Dice getDice2()
        This is used to get the Dice object dice2 from Craps. This is so that other classes can access the information stored in the Dice.
        Returns:
        the Dice object dice2

      • setSumOfRolls

        public void setSumOfRolls(int num)
        This method is mainly to be used for testing. It allows the variable sumOfRolls to be set to an inputted Integer value.
        Parameters:
        num - The value that sumOfRolls will be set to.

      • getSumOfRolls

        public int getSumOfRolls()
        This method is used for retrieving the variable sumOfRolls.
        Returns:
        The variable sumOfRolls.

      • loadFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadFile(java.lang.String fileLoc)
        This method is used to load in the lines of a file that is used to keep track of players scores
        Parameters:
        fileLoc - The file location of the file that is wanted to be loaded.
        Returns:
        An arraylist where each part is one line from the file
